txt.en: Gather sticks from nearby bushes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Build a cap-wearing snowman
Found a cap in Winter-home
Found a pipe near one of the tables in Winter-home
Found an acorn below nearby trees
Virgil Greenfield wants you to help him fill the snowman field outside of Winter-home.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
Found a carrot near the chicken coops
Gathered coal near the servants' oven
Gathered sticks from nearby bushes ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Built a cap-wearing snowman

This is one of Virgil's snowmen. It is wearing a cap that looks somewhat akin to that of a farmer.\n\nIt features a wooden pipe, a carrot nose, sticks, an acorn, and coal. Perhaps you can find what you need to build this snowman scattered about Frostbluff.
The materials you need to replicate Virgil's snowman can be found around Frostbluff.\n\nIn order to replicate Virgil's snowman, you will need to gather the right materials.
The snowman-field is outside of Winter-home.\n\nNow that you have gathered all of the necessary supplies, you should return to the field and find a snowpile to build your snowman.

'Clearly, you enjoy a challenge. This was one of the more complex snowmen I created for the festival, and I'm glad to see that you too have a keen eye for art.

'You may need to borrow more than a few things from the patrons of Winter-home, but I'm sure they won't notice. I could be wrong...I guess that would explain some of my snowmen being wrecked.

'Anyway, don't let me hold you back with my rambling. Get to it!'
Find a cap in Winter-home
Find a pipe near one of the tables in Winter-home

Find a carrot near the chicken coops
A Cap-wearing Snowman
